Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory12.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Ooh, right! Nanami has something else to do!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Those graffiti?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Yup yup! This is important stuff! See y'all for now!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Nanami's quite a carefree person. Almost contagious.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Yes, it's an... enviable personality...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Um, I think you have a great personality too, Lucia!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Agreed, rather than some whimsical dice, I'd much prefer working with someone more down to earth.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Back to that Construct Nanami though... there's not much about her on the database.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "She's a bit suspicious if you ask me...", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory62.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "We've reached the coordinates for deploying the Iso-Devices. We'll have to deploy them every 1.5km until it links up with the devices from the other squads.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'The map shows that the other squads are already on the move. We have to hurry.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Is something the matter, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "There's a... connection request from a nearby Construct?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It's from... deep within the Corrupted zones.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Do we know their identity?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Okay, I got it. The Construct\'s named "Tifa", a Support-type Construct, member of the Suzaku squad.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'But according to historical records, the Suzaku commandant had been confirmed KIA a few days prior. All Constructs lost connection, and no one was recalled...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'If I remember correctly, the massive loss of Construct squads also began around that time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'We mistook the Nozzle model as the culprit before, due to the lack of any intact survivor memories and information.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'So the true culprit is this Corrupted named "Iron Maiden"?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Not enough information to confirm for now, but this signal...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant! I... advise against connecting with this signal...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Connecting with more than 3 Constructs at a time will place a heavy burden on your mind, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'And, from our previous experience, this could be a trap as well. We do not know if it might cause any danger to you, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Listen to Lucia.)', 3: '49', 4: '(Insist on connecting)', 5: '50'}
{3: 'Lucia lets out a relieved sigh.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant...!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'System', 3: 'Increasing Mind Beacon output activity...'}
{2: 'System', 3: 'Establishing M.I.N.D. Connection...'}
{2: 'System', 3: 'Connection failed...'}
{3: 'Lucia lets out a relieved sigh.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Sorry, I should not have been relieved for the loss of contact with other Constructs.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'm more worried about your safety than other squads, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Lucia, you might be a bit paranoid about this. Though the human body is frail and easily destroyed by the Punishing Virus...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "However, the Punishing Virus can't affect humans on a cognitive level. That's humanity's only advantage against the virus. This is why we fight along side commandants.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Well... The signal is near our designated path anyway, so we could investigate when we're near.", 4: '1'}
